answers.answer: you only gained 6 pounds? Don't feel fat most pregnant women would kill to only gain 6 pounds!
Hunn i was 105 before pregnancy,, now I'm 127..I'm only 27+1..
Im scared because with my daughter i gained so much weight i got preclamsia
Hey! With my first twin pregnancy I developed preeclampsia also, but it was due to high blood pressure.. I before pregnant weight was 138, when I had them at 35 weeks I was only 174

I was 137 before pregnant and 5'6'', now i'm 161 and only 27+2, I talked to my doc because that is a ton of weight gain but she said I was very small entering my pregnancy and she said I could gain another 15 pounds before baby comes and she wouldn't be concerned at all, I gained a lot with my first pregnancy too but I was only 109 before getting pregnant that time and i'm fairly tall so I never looked like a cow, just normal instead of super skinny.

Dont feel bad with my first I was 130lbs before and when I went in to have him I was 190lbs...ugh I was 18 and thought it would be easy to lose it...if I could go back and slap myself lol.....this time I was 198lbs before currently 175lbs :(

With my first pregnancy I started at 145 and gained 50. Didn't really pick up weight until I was 7 months the first time. This time I started at 168 and have only gained 12lbs and I'm only 29 weeks. I'm so happy to have only gained 12 cause I already have a lot of weight to lose that I gained before I was pregnant. Be happy about your weight gain!
Your complaining about six pounds in 20 weeks?? geez feel lucky I've put on around 50. But I'm due in three weeks.
I'm thirty weeks and only gained 10 pounds so far and as long as your weight gain is constant you are okay. I feel really big too but my doctor says I don't even look too big for thirty weeks
Pre Pregnancy Weight 98 pounds Pregnancy Weight 198 and this with big boobs 44dd and baby weight im only 5'0

You are doing great weight wise!!! I am embarrased to say that i started at 125 (I am 5'3) & now i'm at 162 at 27+2 weeks. It's not even like i am stuffing my face 24/7 either.. actually i am at the point when i overeat i feel like total crap.. so i don't..
I was 105 when I got pregnant with my first( bout 20 pounds underweight) I ended up gaining 55-60 during my pregnancy..
dnt feel fat! i was 116 pre pregnancy, went down to 106 from bein sick nd now im at 137 :/ im 31w5d.... i weigh more than my mom nd my brother :/ haha

i know the feeling!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! i feel like a freak'n whale nd i've gained ONE POUND!!! i'm 22+4 today and i just feel so blaaaah. i've never been anywhere near overweight or even have a big belly nd now its like there nd i don't like it. hubby tries to remind me that its just our baby girl growing, but i'm not hearing it lol

question: Ok i was 132 before preggo now im 138 im 20+2 now i feeling huge :(
